turns.en: Hi! Welcome in. What can I get started for you today?
turns.zh: 嗨！歡迎光臨。今天想先來點什麼？

turns.en: Sure. What size would you like—small, medium, or large?
turns.zh: 好的。你想要小杯、中杯還是大杯？

turns.en: Great. Do you want it hot or iced?
turns.zh: 好的。你要熱的還是冰的？

turns.en: No problem. Would you like any extra shot or less sugar?
turns.zh: 沒問題。需要加一份濃縮或少糖嗎？

turns.hint_en: An extra shot would be great, and no sugar.
turns.hint_zh: 幫我加一份濃縮，不要糖。

turns.en: Got it. Anything to eat today? We have sandwiches and muffins.
turns.zh: 了解。要不要來點吃的？我們有三明治跟瑪芬。

turns.en: Okay. That’ll be NT$120. Cash or card?
turns.zh: 好的。一共是 120 元。要付現還是刷卡？

turns.en: All set. What name should I put on the cup?
turns.zh: 好了。杯子上要寫什麼名字？

turns.en: Thanks, Raymond. Your latte will be ready in a few minutes.
turns.zh: 謝謝你，Raymond。你的拿鐵幾分鐘後就好。
